lines.text: I think… we kinda have to go with the obvious, here.
I mean, he’s super dead. Slick here shot him.
That just seems like the sort of thing that would stop him from casting a spell, y’know?
That spell doesn’t have any weird failure conditions, like with the statue thing?
I think it’s just… you can’t cast a spell if you’re not alive.
(I mean, unless you're a lich or something. I'm just... not going to worry about the undead right now.)
You’re sure he didn't get shot <c=#FF00FF>after</c> he cast the spell and failed?
Well, I don’t think there’s really anything else that could’ve stopped him from casting it.
‘’Bullet’’ is definitely looking like the most likely suspect here.
Alright, then. I’ll take your word for it, magic expert.
